title: Olympics - Bobsleigh - Canada and Germany in dead-heat for gold
text: February 19, 2018 / 2:13 PM / Updated 12 minutes ago Olympics - Bobsleigh - Canada and Germany in dead-heat for gold Reuters Staff 1 Min Read PYEONGCHANG,   Canada’s Justin Kripps and Germany’s Francesco Friedrich won gold medals after a dead-heat in the men’s Olympic two-man bobsleigh on Monday. Kripps and four-times world champion Friedrich both finished with identical times of three minutes 16.86 seconds. Latvia’s Oskars Melbardis took bronze. It was the first dead-heat in the Olympic two-man bobsleigh competition since Nagano in 1998. Reporting by James Pearson,
